title: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
description: Marinated chicken breasts are grilled to tender perfection and topped with a quick honey mustard sauce and garden-fresh toppings

title: Fried Chicken Sandwich
description: This fried chicken sandwich is ultra crispy on the outside, tender & juicy on the inside and bursting with flavour all over!

title: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Sweet BBQ sauce, chopped chicken, red onions, a dash of cilantro, and tons of cheese.

title: Personal Pizza
description: Building your own pizzas and tailor it fit your, dietary need, taste preference etc.

title: All American Cheese Burger
description: American cheese with lettuce, tomato, onions, pickles, catsup, mayonaise and a free 1/2 pound ground chuck patty

title: Dutch French Fries
description: These are not your typical fries, they are broad, strong, and a little chunky.

title: Pumpkin Spice - Cupcake
description: These hearty pumpkin cupcakes are topped with a cinnamon cream cheese frosting. Delicious in the fall for a tasty treat.

title: Cookies and Cream - Cupcake
description: These Oreo cupcakes will melt in your mouth and that cookies and cream frosting on top is nearly too good too be true.
